content.query:
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT CSVFileFormat
WITH (  
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
    FORMAT_OPTIONS (
        FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
        STRING_DELIMITER = '"',
        FIRST_ROW = 2,
        USE_TYPE_DEFAULT=TRUE
    )
);
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT csv
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
    FORMAT_OPTIONS (
        FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
        STRING_DELIMITER = '',
        DATE_FORMAT = '',
        USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = False
    )
);
GO
